docs.snippet: Growth in Britain's private sector picked up speed in the three months to February, according to a survey published on Friday by an employers group, contrasting with some recent signs of a slowdown in other gauges of the economy....

headline.main: UK Firms Report Stronger Growth, Inflation Test Awaits-CBI
